content:
Oh, by the way I noticed something off here. Small but important. When hovered over streams present in the left column, a 'down-arrow' icon is displayed denoting it is a expandible tile. But when hovered over different topics within a stream, the same 'down-arrow' is displayed which again represents an expandible tile which is not true.
Proposed solution: Replace it with a right arrow. What do you think?
Untitled.png
Oohh nice, this has my vote :+1: There is ongoing discussion relating to this in #design > Stream Buttons
Here if I am to make any changes in the code, where is that supposed to be made? Can someone please help me here.
Steve mentioned #7764 in the topic linked above. This should help you to draft a proposal of your idea.
This issue does not have a "help wanted" or "good first issue" label. How am I to proceed with this?

Priyanshu.barnwal said:

This issue does not have a "help wanted" or "good first issue" label. How am I to proceed with this?

You can always mention in the comments that you are working on the issue. That should be fine.
